meanings.definition: Devices or drugs used to prevent pregnancy.
meanings.sent1: She always carries contraceptives in her bag.
meanings.sent2: Many couples rely on contraceptives to plan their families.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the importance of contraceptives in his stand-up routine.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against unplanned pregnancies, contraceptives are the soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained the different types of contraceptives available to her patients.

meanings.definition: Methods or practices used to avoid conception.
meanings.sent1: They discussed various contraceptives during their health class.
meanings.sent2: Traditional societies often have their own unique contraceptives.
meanings.sent3: The movie character always found creative ways to forget her contraceptives at home.
meanings.sent4: In their relationship, trust was the best contraceptive against misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the importance of using contraceptives responsibly.
